Text.Page: This island has cost us much, but Elleon saw us through. We who survived will always be known as Elleon's Expedition. He is an inspiration to us allâ€”though I wish he'd learn he doesn't have to personally investigate every single report.

Welcome, <PCNAME>. Thanks to your help, the base's defenses have been much improved. This would've been very difficult to achieve without you, <PCNAME>. It's too early for our expedition team to resume their work, but I feel that we've certainly taken a step in the right direction.
Ah, it's you, <PCNAME>. We can resume the expedition now, thanks to you. And it's not just me; the entire expedition team thanks you. You've done something really great for us.
